Package server

Class DBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.DBController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class DBController
extends AbstractServer
    This class is used to route all server DB calls into their specific controller, it splits the msg into key word and uses cases to call upon the corresponding function
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dorin bahar

      • handleMessageFromClient

        public void handleMessageFromClient​(java.lang.Object msg,
                                    ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Handles a command sent from one client to the server. This MUST be implemented by subclasses, who should respond to messages. This method is called by a synchronized method so it is also implcitly synchronized.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromClient in class AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        msg - the message sent.
        client - the connection connected to the client that sent the message.

      • serverStarted

        protected void serverStarted()
        This method overrides the one in the superclass. Called when the server starts listening for connections.
        Overrides:
        serverStarted in class AbstractServer

      • importUsers

        public void importUsers​(java.lang.String[] res)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Func for importing users to DB from outside "USER IMPORT utility"
        Parameters:
        res - res[0] used to start function, rest of res for details we need for queries,
        res - [0] "Import_user",
        res - [1..] User details from ToString like firstname,last name ,email and so on
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createCertifiedEmployee

        public void createCertifiedEmployee​(java.lang.String[] res)
        Func for creating a certified employee used in import users utility to attach a supplier to an employee
        Parameters:
        res - res[0] used to start function, rest of res for details we need for queries,
        res - [0] "Create_certifies_employee",
        res - [1] ID ;
        res - [2] supplier id

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped()
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Hook method called when the server stops accepting connections. The default implementation does nothing. This method may be overriden by subclasses.
        Overrides:
        serverStopped in class AbstractServer

      • serverClosed

        protected void serverClosed()
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Hook method called when the server is closed. The default implementation does nothing. This method may be overriden by subclasses. When the server is closed while still listening, serverStopped() will also be called.
        Overrides:
        serverClosed in class AbstractServer

      • sendToClient

        protected void sendToClient​(java.lang.Object msg,
                            ConnectionToClient client)
